about_the_game:
Discover a world of festive fun in Christmas Yarn 2, a captivating match-3 adventure designed to bring holiday cheer to your screen!

The game is a delightful journey through a winter wonderland. Adjust the difficulty to suit your preference, making it perfect for both casual players and seasoned gamers. Share the fun with family and friends of all ages, and immerse yourself in the warm, inviting visuals that capture the magic of Christmas.

But the excitement doesn't end there – challenge yourself with Jigsaw, Pipes, Memory, and Sliders mini-games for an extra layer of entertainment. Celebrate your victories in the Trophy Room, where you can collect and display Christmas-themed trophies as a testament to your skills.

Download now and unwrap the magic of the holiday season!

Features

✪ A Christmas Match-3 to put you in the holiday mood
✪ Trophy room: Earn gold and collect Trophies
✪ Match-3 gameplay: Easy to play but hard to master
✪ Variety of mini games: Pipe Joining, Slider, Jigsaw, and Memory
✪ 100 levels of match-3 fun
✪ Adjustable difficulty and gameplay options

CE Edition Features

✪ CE Extras: 66 More Match 3 Levels!
✪ CE Extras: 5 Jigsaws
✪ CE Extras: 10 Pipe Puzzles
✪ CE Extras: 10 Slider Puzzles
✪ CE Extras: 5 Wallpapers!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10 Yosemite
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Christmas Yarn 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Soak in the match-3 magic and holiday cheer with Christmas Yarn 2! Play enchanting puzzles, decorate your Christmas tree with trophies, and have a jolly good time!
